description.content: Handles user authentication through email and password, initiates a secure stateful session, and provides both access and refresh JWT tokens together with essential user information.

response.name: User successfully authenticated with tokens issued (OK).
Authentication required or invalid credentials (UnauthorizedError).
The request payload contains invalid data (ValidationError).

description.content: Performs secure token rotation by validating the current refresh token and issuing a new access/refresh pair, thereby extending the user's session lifecycle.

response.name: New token pair successfully issued and rotated (OK).
Authentication required or invalid credentials (UnauthorizedError).

description.content: Securely terminates the active session and blacklists the associated refresh token, preventing any subsequent reuse.

response.name: Session successfully terminated and tokens invalidated (No Content).

description.content: Added as a part of security scheme: bearer

description.content:
# Syphilis Cases Monitoring System (SIMCASI)

This API provides resources for tracking, monitoring, and governance of syphilis cases in a hospital environment.

### Audit and Governance
All write operations (`POST`, `PATCH`, `DELETE`) require audit metadata:
* `ipAddress`: Client's IP address.
* `userAgent`: Device/browser identifier.
